item.title: Co-founder of Elon Musk’s xAI departs the company
item.description: Igor Babuschkin is leaving xAI less than three years after he co-founded the startup with Elon Musk, following a series of scandals at company.

item.title: Waymo finally has a music experience worthy of its robotaxi
item.description: Waymo now lets you stream music straight from Spotify, which makes the back seat of a robotaxi feel more like your own private space.

item.title: Google CEO adds a new calendar feature at Stripe co-founder’s request
item.description: While users often tag companies and CEOs with online feedback and complaints, you know you've made it when the CEO not only replies to you, but also i...

item.title: India’s Rapido begins testing food delivery to take on Swiggy, Zomato
item.description: Rapido's beta food delivery service has popped up in three key localities in Bengaluru before a broader rollout.

item.title: Instagram is developing a feature that helps users find shared interests
item.description: People select their favorite movies, books, TV shows, games, and music, or their "Picks." Instagram then finds overlaps with friends who chose the sam...
